      • authrep

        AuthorizeResponse authrep(ParameterMap metrics)
                          throws ServerError
        Performs and AuthRep operation
        Parameters:
        metrics - The app_id and metrics for this authrep
        Returns:
        Information about the success/failure of the operation and the current metrics
        Throws:
        ServerError - Thrown if there is an error communicating with the 3Scale server
